title.newValue: Microsoft Teams: Moodle Learning Management System integration

description.newValue:
In addition to integration with Canvas and Blackboard, Microsoft has now partnered with Moodle Learning Management System to deliver seamless integrated learning experiences. Microsoft Teams Meeting LTI and Classes LTI apps are now available within Moodle.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/lti/moodle-plugin-configuration?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: June CY2022
